messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Sesame Street
messages.msgSnippet: ... Ah, yes.  Armed Forces Network is so wonderful, isn t it?  We now get 5 channels on free AFN. Yesterday at 2 p.m. I had the choice of the Fox Morning News
messages.messageBody:
1/11/03 16:36:

> Oddly, Brenda, when I watched it was when we were stationed in Germany! I was
> *just* pregnant and living in the Amelia Earhart Hotel next to the Mainz
> hospital. The only tv was Armed Forces (preprogrammed, Sesame Street one hour
> everyday, no other channels).

Ah, yes. Armed Forces Network is so wonderful, isn't it? We now get 5
channels on free AFN.

Yesterday at 2 p.m. I had the choice of the Fox Morning News (4th time in a
row they ran the exact same half hour), a football game rerun, Sesame
Street, an old horror movie, or "local programming" -- military people
running the cameras and the news desk.

I took local programming, it's always funnier than Sesame Street. <beg>

brenda
